description technical detail:
Acer V226WLbd 22 LED VGA DVI Monitor
Find the working angle thats perfect for you with a monitor that tilts, swivels, pivots and can be adjusted for height. The stand also has a magnetic area, perfect for holding paperclips and keeping your desk uncluttered. This monitor is also wall-mountable, giving you clear views with more room.
Focus more sharply on your tasks with the superior contrast ratios and ultra-quick response of Professional series monitor. Plentiful built-in display technologies deliver consistent viewing across wide angles, faster response time for reduced eye strain, and more realistic colors.
dimensions weight details: Without stand - width: 50.58 cm - depth: 5.2 cm - height: 33.31 cm - weight: 3.09 kg
dimensions wxdxh: 50.58 cm x 20.7 cm x 41.91 cm - with stand
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
